verses.kjv: Again the word of the LORD of hosts came to me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD of hosts came to me again, saying,

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; I was jealous for Zion with great jealousy, and I was jealous for her with great fury.
verses.ct: This is what the LORD of hosts says: 'I have been intensely passionate about Zion — burning with fierce devotion for her.'

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD; I am returned unto Zion, and will dwell in the midst of Jerusalem: and Jerusalem shall be called a city of truth; and the mountain of the LORD of hosts the holy mountain.
verses.ct: This is what the LORD says: 'I have returned to Zion and will live in the heart of Jerusalem. Jerusalem will be known as the City of Truth, and the mountain of the LORD of hosts will be called the Holy Mountain.'

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; There shall yet old men and old women dwell in the streets of Jerusalem, and every man with his staff in his hand for very age.
verses.ct: This is what the LORD of hosts says: 'Elderly men and women will once again sit in the open areas of Jerusalem, each one leaning on a cane because of their advanced age.'

verses.kjv: And the streets of the city shall be full of boys and girls playing in the streets thereof.
verses.ct: 'The city's open areas will be filled with boys and girls playing in them.'

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; If it be marvellous in the eyes of the remnant of this people in these days, should it also be marvellous in mine eyes? saith the LORD of hosts.
verses.ct: This is what the LORD of hosts says: 'If this seems impossible to the surviving remnant of this people in those days, should it also seem impossible to me?' declares the LORD of hosts.

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; Behold, I will save my people from the east country, and from the west country;
verses.ct: This is what the LORD of hosts says: 'Look, I am going to rescue my people from countries to the east and countries to the west.'

verses.kjv: And I will bring them, and they shall dwell in the midst of Jerusalem: and they shall be my people, and I will be their God, in truth and in righteousness.
verses.ct: 'I will bring them back, and they will live in the heart of Jerusalem. They will be my people, and I will be their God, in truth and in righteousness.'

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; Let your hands be strong, ye that hear in these days these words by the mouth of the prophets, which were in the day that the foundation of the house of the LORD of hosts was laid, that the temple might be built.
verses.ct: This is what the LORD of hosts says: 'Take courage, all of you who are hearing these words spoken by the prophets in these days — the same prophets who were present when the foundation of the temple of the LORD of hosts was laid, so that it could be rebuilt.'

verses.kjv: For before these days there was no hire for man, nor any hire for beast; neither was there any peace to him that went out or came in because of the affliction: for I set all men every one against his neighbour.
verses.ct: 'Before those days, there were no wages for people and no wages for animals. No one could travel safely in or out because of the hostility, since I had turned everyone against each other.'

verses.kjv: But now I will not be unto the residue of this people as in the former days, saith the LORD of hosts.
verses.ct: 'But now I will not treat the remnant of this people the way I did in those earlier days,' declares the LORD of hosts.

verses.kjv: For the seed shall be prosperous; the vine shall give her fruit, and the ground shall give her increase, and the heavens shall give their dew; and I will cause the remnant of this people to possess all these things.
verses.ct: 'The crops will thrive, the vines will produce their fruit, the ground will yield its harvest, and the heavens will release their dew. I will give the remnant of this people ownership of all these blessings.'

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass, that as ye were a curse among the heathen, O house of Judah, and house of Israel; so will I save you, and ye shall be a blessing: fear not, but let your hands be strong.
verses.ct: 'Just as you became an example of a curse among the nations, people of Judah and people of Israel, so now I will rescue you, and you will become an example of blessing. Don't be afraid — take courage!'

verses.kjv: For thus saith the LORD of hosts; As I thought to punish you, when your fathers provoked me to wrath, saith the LORD of hosts, and I repented not:
verses.ct: This is what the LORD of hosts says: 'Just as I determined to bring disaster on you when your ancestors provoked me to anger,' declares the LORD of hosts, 'and I did not hold back,

verses.kjv: So again have I thought in these days to do well unto Jerusalem and to the house of Judah: fear ye not.
verses.ct: so now I have determined in these days to do good to Jerusalem and to the people of Judah. Don't be afraid.'

verses.kjv: These are the things that ye shall do; Speak ye every man the truth to his neighbour; execute the judgment of truth and peace in your gates:
verses.ct: 'Here is what you must do: Tell the truth to one another. Make decisions in your courts that are honest and promote peace.'

verses.kjv: And let none of you imagine evil in your hearts against his neighbour; and love no false oath: for all these are things that I hate, saith the LORD.
verses.ct: 'Don't plot harm against each other in your hearts, and don't love swearing false oaths — because all of these things I despise,' declares the LORD.

verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD of hosts came unto me, saying,
verses.ct: The word of the LORD of hosts came to me, saying,

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; The fast of the fourth month, and the fast of the fifth, and the fast of the seventh, and the fast of the tenth, shall be to the house of Judah joy and gladness, and cheerful feasts; therefore love the truth and peace.
verses.ct: This is what the LORD of hosts says: 'The fasts of the 4th month, the 5th, the 7th, and the 10th will become occasions of joy, happiness, and celebration for the people of Judah. So love truth and peace.'

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; It shall yet come to pass, that there shall come people, and the inhabitants of many cities:
verses.ct: This is what the LORD of hosts says: 'The time is still coming when peoples and residents of many cities will arrive.'

verses.kjv: And the inhabitants of one city shall go to another, saying, Let us go speedily to pray before the LORD, and to seek the LORD of hosts: I will go also.
verses.ct: 'Residents of one city will go to another and say, "Let's go right away to seek the LORD's presence and to search for the LORD of hosts. I'm going!"'

verses.kjv: Yea, many people and strong nations shall come to seek the LORD of hosts in Jerusalem, and to pray before the LORD.
verses.ct: 'Yes, many peoples and powerful nations will come to Jerusalem to search for the LORD of hosts and to seek his presence.'

verses.kjv: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; In those days it shall come to pass, that ten men shall take hold out of all languages of the nations, even shall take hold of the skirt of him that is a Jew, saying, We will go with you: for we have heard that God is with you.
verses.ct: This is what the LORD of hosts says: 'In those days, 10 men from nations speaking every language will grab hold of the robe of a Jewish person and say, "Let us come with you, because we have heard that God is with you."'
